text: Costantinella is a genus of anamorphic fungi in the family Morchellaceae and class Pezizomycetes ==Species== The Catalogue of Life lists: * Costantinella cristata * Costantinella athrix * Costantinella micheneri * Costantinella terrestris ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Morchellaceae
title: Costantinella
